market_position.description: Salesforce remains the #1 CRM for the sixth year in a row
initiatives: Maintaining leadership in sales, service, and other areas
Leading in model-driven application platforms with 6 million developers
Leadership in marketing, commerce, and integration platforms with MuleSoft
goals: Drive growth through innovation and platform expansion
examples: Ranked #1 by IDC Worldwide Software Tracker
Service Cloud exceeding $4 billion annual run rate

innovation.description: Relentless focus on innovation with intelligent Customer 360 and platform enhancements
initiatives: Customer 360 providing unified customer views across sales, service, marketing, commerce, and communities
Einstein AI platform services enabling AI-powered app building
Salesforce Blockchain introduction as the first declarative blockchain service
My Trailhead product for customer reskilling and workforce development
goals: Empower customers with AI and blockchain capabilities
Drive workforce development and ecosystem growth
examples: Customer 360 driving growth in customer organizations
Salesforce Blockchain enabling supply chain improvements
Trailhead empowering 1.4 million learners and creating over 3 million jobs

mulesoft.description: Integration of MuleSoft into Salesforce ecosystem
goals: Leverage MuleSoft for API management and integration
examples: MuleSoft named leader in Gartner Magic Quadrant for Enterprise Integration Platform as a Service
Recognition in Gartner's Magic Quadrant for Full Life Cycle API Management

ecosystem_development.description: Growth of Salesforce ecosystem through Trailhead and partnerships
initiatives: Trailhead online learning and reskilling platform
My Trailhead for customers to create branded learning experiences
goals: Create more than 3 million jobs and $850 billion in GDP by 2022
Provide over 1 million Americans with Salesforce credentials
examples: Accenture leveraging My Trailhead for employee reskilling
Trailblazer Day and White House Pledge to America's Workers

social_initiatives.description: Salesforce.org reunification and enhanced nonprofit support
goals: Empower nonprofit, education, and philanthropy customers to fulfill their missions
examples: Salesforce.org now fully part of Salesforce
Supporting nonprofit customers with unified services

revenue_growth.expectation: Healthy bookings growth with continued demand for hybrid and cloud offerings

factors: Growth in Salesforce platform and cloud services
revenue_growth.specifics: FY 2020 revenue guidance of $16.25 billion, representing 22% projected growth year-over-year

drivers: Continued investment in AI and commercial sales capacity
